strapiEvent.name: Northwest Arkansas Festival
strapiEvent.description:
LARGE ARTS & CRAFTS FAIR WITH A BBQ COMPETITION, LIVE MUSIC, BEER TENT & GARDEN, AUCTION AND FOOD TRUCKS. RAISING MONEY FOR THE NWA FOOD BANK AND LOCAL YOUTH GROUPS


LEARN MORE HERE.


DATES: SEP 22-24

LOCATION: 1991 FOREST HILLS BLVD, BELLA VISTA , ARKANSAS
